org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client

Class ZKAsyncRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.ZKAsyncRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, AsyncRegistry

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
class ZKAsyncRegistry
extends Object
implements AsyncRegistry
    Fetch the registry data from zookeeper.
